label: SearchIndexerStatus
description: Represents the current status and execution history of an indexer.

fields.label: Current State
fields.tooltip: All of the state that defines and dictates the indexer's current execution.

fields.label: Last Result
fields.tooltip: The result of the most recent or an in-progress indexer execution.

fields.label: Execution History
fields.tooltip: History of the recent indexer executions, sorted in reverse chronological order.

fields.label: Limits
fields.tooltip: The execution limits for the indexer.

fields.label: Runtime
fields.tooltip: Snapshot of the indexer's cumulative runtime consumption for the service over the current UTC period.
